description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Retrieve your coins from the farm, but be careful as the farmer has sent out his helicopters to try and stop you claiming back the coins that are rightfully yours. Make sure you storm the barns to get all the coins you can. Includes global Hi-Score table
